Title: Relates to establishing an electoral voting system for electing the governor, lieutenant-governor, comptroller and attorney general
Summary: Establishes an electoral voting system for electing the governor, lieutenant-governor, comptroller and attorney general.
LawCode: Amd Art 4 ยง1, add Art 4 ยง1-a, Art 5 ยง1-a, Constn
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to article 4 and article 5 of the constitution, in relation to establishing an electoral college system for electing the governor, lieutenant-governor, comptroller and attorney general
